shortdesc.ph: Updates the transcoding configuration for CDN streaming.

p.codeblock: public abstract int UpdateRtmpTranscodingEx(LiveTranscoding transcoding, RtcConnection connection);

section.p: Agora recommends using the more comprehensive server-side streaming feature. See [Implement server-side CDN streaming](https://doc.shengwang.cn/doc/media-push/restful/landing-page). After enabling transcoding streaming, you can dynamically update the transcoding configuration based on your scenario. After the configuration is updated, the SDK triggers the callback.

Agora recommends using the more comprehensive server-side CDN streaming service. See [Implement server-side CDN streaming](https://doc.shengwang.cn/doc/media-push/restful/landing-page). After enabling transcoding streaming, you can dynamically update the transcoding configuration based on your scenario. After the update, the SDK triggers the callback.

Agora recommends using the more comprehensive server-side streaming feature. See [Implement Server-Side RTMP Streaming](https://doc.shengwang.cn/doc/media-push/restful/landing-page). After enabling transcoding streaming, you can dynamically update the transcoding configuration based on your scenario needs. After the transcoding configuration is updated, the SDK triggers the callback.

Agora recommends using a more complete server-side streaming service. See [Implement Server-Side RTMP Streaming](https://doc.shengwang.cn/doc/media-push/restful/landing-page). After enabling transcoding streaming, you can dynamically update the transcoding configuration based on your scenario. After the transcoding configuration is updated, the SDK triggers the callback.

plentry.pd: The transcoding configuration for the CDN stream. See .
The transcoding configuration for CDN streaming. See .
The transcoding configuration for RTMP streaming. See .

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: < 0: The method call fails. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
< 0: The method call fails. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
